verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>speaks<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3789>Write<s%> you <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to you in a <S%H5612>book.<s%>

For, <S%H2009>see,<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that I will <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and I will cause them to <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and they shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.
And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1697>words<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H413>concerning<s%> <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H2731>trembling,<s%> of <S%H6343>fear,<s%> and not of <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

<S%H7592>Ask<s%> you <S%H4994>now,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> a <S%H2145>man<s%> does <S%H3205>travail<s%> with <S%H3205>child?<s%> <S%H4069>why<s%> do I <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%> with his <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H2504>loins,<s%> as a woman in <S%H3205>travail,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6440>faces<s%> are <S%H2015>turned<s%> into <S%H3420>paleness?<s%>

<S%H1945>Alas!<s%> for that <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H1419>great,<s%> so that <S%H369>none<s%> is <S%H3644>like<s%> it: it is even the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H6869>trouble,<s%> but he shall be <S%H3467>saved<s%> out of it.

For it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> that I will <S%H7665>break<s%> his <S%H5923>yoke<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> your <S%H6677>neck,<s%> and will <S%H5423>burst<s%> your <S%H4147>bonds,<s%> and <S%H2114>strangers<s%> shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> themselves of him:
But they shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> their <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I will <S%H6965>raise<s%> up to them.

Therefore <S%H3372>fear<s%> you not, O my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> be <S%H2865>dismayed,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> for, <S%H2009>see,<s%> I will <S%H3467>save<s%> you from <S%H7350>afar,<s%> and your <S%H2233>seed<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H7628>captivity;<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall <S%H7725>return,<s%> and shall be in <S%H8252>rest,<s%> and be <S%H7599>quiet,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall make him <S%H2729>afraid.<s%>

For I am with you, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> you: <S%H3588>though<s%> I <S%H6213>make<s%> a full <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I have <S%H6327>scattered<s%> you, <S%H389>yet<s%> I will not <S%H6213>make<s%> a full <S%H3615>end<s%> of you: but I will <S%H3256>correct<s%> you in <S%H4941>measure,<s%> and will not leave you altogether <S%H5352>unpunished.<s%>
For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> Your <S%H7667>bruise<s%> is <S%H605>incurable,<s%> and your <S%H4347>wound<s%> is <S%H2470>grievous.<s%>
There is <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H1777>plead<s%> your <S%H1779>cause,<s%> that you may be <S%H4205>bound<s%> up: you have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H8585>healing<s%> <S%H7499>medicines.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> your <S%H157>lovers<s%> have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> you; they <S%H1875>seek<s%> you not; for I have <S%H5221>wounded<s%> you with the <S%H4347>wound<s%> of an <S%H341>enemy,<s%> with the <S%H4148>chastisement<s%> of a <S%H394>cruel<s%> one, for the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> because your <S%H2403>sins<s%> were <S%H6105>increased.<s%>

<S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H2199>cry<s%> you for your <S%H7667>affliction?<s%> your <S%H4341>sorrow<s%> is <S%H605>incurable<s%> for the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H5771>iniquity:<s%> because your <S%H2403>sins<s%> were <S%H6105>increased,<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things to you.

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> they that <S%H398>devour<s%> you shall be <S%H398>devoured;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one of them, shall <S%H3212>go<s%> into <S%H7633>captivity;<s%> and they that <S%H7701>spoil<s%> you shall be a <S%H4933>spoil,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H962>prey<s%> on you will I <S%H5414>give<s%> for a <S%H962>prey.<s%>

For I will <S%H5927>restore<s%> <S%H724>health<s%> to you, and I will <S%H7495>heal<s%> you of your <S%H4347>wounds,<s%> said the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they <S%H7121>called<s%> you an <S%H5080>Outcast,<s%> saying, <S%H1931>This<s%> is <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> whom <S%H369>no<s%> man <S%H1875>seeks<s%> after.

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H168>tents,<s%> and have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on his dwelling <S%H4908>places;<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H1129>built<s%> on her own <S%H8510>heap,<s%> and the <S%H759>palace<s%> shall <S%H3427>remain<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> the <S%H4941>manner<s%> thereof.

And out of them shall <S%H3318>proceed<s%> <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of them that make <S%H7832>merry:<s%> and I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> them, and they shall not be <S%H4591>few;<s%> I will also <S%H3513>glorify<s%> them, and they shall not be <S%H6819>small.<s%>

Their <S%H1121>children<s%> also shall be as <S%H6924>aforetime,<s%> and their <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, and I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3905>oppress<s%> them.

And their <S%H117>nobles<s%> shall be of themselves, and their <S%H4910>governor<s%> shall <S%H3318>proceed<s%> from the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of them; and I will cause him to draw <S%H7126>near,<s%> and he shall <S%H5066>approach<s%> to me: for <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H2088><s%> that <S%H6148>engaged<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H5066>approach<s%> to me? <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And you shall be my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will be your <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H5591>whirlwind<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3318>goes<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> with <S%H2534>fury,<s%> a <S%H1641>continuing<s%> <S%H5591>whirlwind:<s%> it shall <S%H2342>fall<s%> with <S%H2342>pain<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

The <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall not <S%H7725>return,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he has <S%H6213>done<s%> it, and <S%H5704>until<s%> he have <S%H6965>performed<s%> the <S%H4209>intents<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart:<s%> in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H995>consider<s%> it.
